title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (2008 PC Game)
description:
Legend of Galactic Heroes (Japanese: Ã©Å â‚¬Ã¦Â²Â³Ã¨â€¹Â±Ã©â€ºâ€žÃ¤Â¼ï¿½Ã¨ÂªÂ¬) is a strategy game for Microsoft Windows-based PCs based on the show. Developed by MiCROViSiON and published by NAMCO BANDAI Games, it was originally released on 16 October 2008.

System requirements:

Operating system: Microsoft Windows XP SP2 / Microsoft Windows Vista
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400 2.13 GHz or better (Core 2 Duo E6750 2.66 GHz recommendedÃ¯Â¼â€°
Memory: 1 GB or more (2 GB recommended)
HDD space: 2 GB or more (4 GB recommended)
Video: 128 MB or more video RAM (GeForce 8600 GT recommended), 1024x768 or higher resolution
Other: DirectX 9.0c or higher
Optional: Internet connection, Xbox 360 controller

Notice: 

This game is in Japanese. Go on this website for an English guide for the game: http://kinofthestars.heavenforum.org/t128-legend-of-galactic-heroes-pc-game

Installation Instructions (they are on the website, too):

1. Mount the MDF file on a virtual drive program like DaemonTools.
2. Run the Disc and begin the installer.
3. Click on the button in the middle which has an '(N)' for next.
4. You will see the license notice. Now mark the top choice and click on next.
5. You get to choose standard (TOP) or custom (BOTTOM) installation.
6. Custom installation just lets you change the installation directory.
7. Click on next.You will be asked for your key. 
8. Type the key from the CD+Key file. The left button should turn on.
9. If you get an error, you probably typed it in incorrectly.
10. The installer will install your game for you. After, press whatever to play.

After you start the game you are required to create a Windows Live profile within the game. Click on the top button to create on, type your player name etc. If it fails the game will exit. Start it again and try again.

I highly recommend reviewing the page I linked in order to help you learn the game. 

Oh! And please seed, thanks!
